#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std ;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
    ll i,j,k,n,m,p,t ;
    cin >> t ;
    while(t--) {
        cin >> n ;
        if(n%2 == 1){
            cout << 0 << endl ;
            continue ;
        }
        else {
            cout << 9 ;
            n = (n-2)/2 ;
            while(n--) {
                cout << 0 ;
            }
            cout << endl ;
        }
    }
    return 0 ;
}
